CustomField.formula:
IF( and(ISNULL(EBH_AcceptedTC__c), ISNULL(EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c)) , NULL,
IF(ISNULL(EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c),
IF(ISNULL(EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c), TODAY() - EBH_AcceptedTC__c, EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c - EBH_AcceptedTC__c),
IF(ISNULL(EBH_AcceptedTC__c),
IF(ISNULL(EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c), TODAY() - EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c, EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c - EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c),
IF(ISNULL(EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c), TODAY() - IF( EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c < EBH_AcceptedTC__c, EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c, EBH_AcceptedTC__c),
EBH_EBFSKUIDCreationDate__c - IF( EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c < EBH_AcceptedTC__c, EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c, EBH_AcceptedTC__c))
)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: # Days that seller spent in Onboarding stage (starting from the date when 3PP or Terms & Conditions were selected in Shutl to the date when EBFSKU Prefix was created)
CustomField.label: Days in Onboarding
